utilities.aws2cosipy.aws2cosipy¶

This file reads the input data (model forcing) and write the output to netcdf file. There is the create_1D_input (point model) and create_2D_input (distirbuted simulations) function. In case of the 1D input, the function works without a static file, in that file the static variables are created. For both cases, lapse rates can be determined in the aws2cosipyConfig.py file.
